name: Wavey Shark
description: A whimsically rotund shark toy with the playful ability to spray water, this model is a full-scale replica of the wave machine from "Easybreeze Holiday Resort." Once installed in the Serenitea Pot, "Wavey Shark" quickly became a favorite among the resident animals. After all, who could resist a toy that is both adorable in appearance and delightfully refreshing?
